title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
Meet your do-it-all carry: the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack. Built for workdays, weekend trips, and everything in between, it seamlessly blends pro-level organization with travel-ready convenience and a built-in lunch solution.

Why you’ll love it:
- Fits more, protects better: Dedicated padded sleeve holds 17.3/15.6/15/14/13.3 inch laptops safely, with a roomy main compartment for clothes, files, and daily essentials.
- Built-in lunch cooler: An insulated, foldable cooler compartment (11.4 x 5.5 x 6.9 in) holds up to 10 cans and keeps meals warm or drinks cold for 3–5 hours. Lined with water-resistant aluminum and high-quality materials for easy cleanup.
- TSA smart design: Lay-flat 90–180° TSA-friendly opening speeds you through airport security. Flight-approved size with a luggage strap to slip over your suitcase handle.
- Charge on the go: External USB port and included cable let you power up anywhere (power bank not included).
- Organize effortlessly: Two front pockets, interior organizers with a slot and key hook, plus dual side pockets for umbrellas or tissues.
- Travel-ready comfort: Breathable mesh padding on the back, shoulder straps, and handle keeps you cool and supported all day.
- Secure and durable: Hidden anti-theft back pocket protects passports, wallets, and IDs. Water-resistant, high-density polyester resists rips, scratches, and sudden showers.

Sized right at 18.1"H x 12.9"L x 8.5"W, this backpack adapts to your life—perfect as a teacher bag, business backpack, picnic pack, or travel companion. It also makes a thoughtful gift for Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, or New Year.

Work smarter, travel lighter, and lunch better—with the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack.
